attributes.action: Tenants working together say "Stop the Bedroom Tax"
attributes.additional_details:
Cutting the housing benefit of social housing tenants with ‘spare’ bedrooms will hit the poor, the vulnerable and the disabled hardest. Coast & Country’s Tenant Panel is harnessing the voice and power of 100,000 social housing tenants to launch a mass protest to stop Bedroom Tax. Join us in our campaign and help get our voice heard in Parliament.


Together we can make a difference!
